definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct

sentences.english: Wellbore and formation are connected by Ramey heat-transfer coefficient.
sentences.chinese: 井筒和地層的溫度通過綜合熱傳導係數聯繫起來。

sentences.english: Heat losses from the reservoir by heat conduction cannot be prevented .
sentences.chinese: 熱儲通過熱傳導的熱損耗是無法阻擋的。

sentences.english: The potentials and fluxes at the interior points close to the boundary are computed for three-dimensional beat conduction examples.
sentences.chinese: 對三維熱傳導算例，計算了近邊界點的溫度和熱流。

sentences.english: The flow and heat transfer calculations are performed inside the computational domain.
sentences.chinese: 流動和熱傳導計算在計算的領域內部被執行。

sentences.english: It is the base of research on heat expansion and heat transfer of single screw compressors.
sentences.chinese: 它是研究單螺桿壓縮機熱膨脹及熱傳導的基礎。

sentences.english: This constant k actually is called the heat conductivity.
sentences.chinese: 這個常數k就叫做熱傳導係數。

sentences.english: Finned cast aluminum heaters offer more efficient heat dissipation.
sentences.chinese: 棒狀鑄鋁加熱器提供更有效熱傳導。

sentences.english: Theoretical models of microscale heat transfer and solving approaches are summarized.
sentences.chinese: 概述了微尺度熱傳導理論的幾種模型及其求解方法。

sentences.english: For example, the heat equation is one example of a partial differential equation.
sentences.chinese: 例如，熱傳導方程就是這樣的例子。

sentences.english: Thecalculations confirm that, in general, the undesirable effects due to sidewise heatconduction are small.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，由側向熱傳導引起的不良效應通常比較小。

sentences.english: Isothermal Block. The thermally conductive block that equalizes the temperature of all thermocouple connections.
sentences.chinese: 等溫塊使所有熱電偶連接的溫度相同的熱傳導塊。

sentences.english: This paper presents the mathematical model of heat transfer on flange plate.
sentences.chinese: 建立了法蘭盤兩側熱傳導的數學模型。
